tagline: See a doctor who listens, diagnoses, and follows up.

benefits.description: Every symptom is documented without rush.
benefits.title: Listen

features.title: No waiting rooms
features.description: We stagger appointments to protect privacy.

features.title: Holistic care
features.description: Stress management and home-care tips accompany prescriptions.
Direct introductions to consultants if escalation is needed.
features.title: Fast referrals

benefits.title: Why Patients Choose Us When They’re Unwell

description: Same-day private GP access for infections, flare-ups, medication reviews, or second opinions—just like the trusted page on drsnaclinic.com/illness.

seo.h1: Private GP for Illness & Acute Concerns
seo.metaDescription: Book urgent private GP appointments in Marylebone for infections, flare-ups, and prescriptions with concierge follow-up.
seo.metaTitle: Same-Day Private GP London | Illness Appointments | Dr. SNA Clinic

title: Illness & Urgent GP Appointments

highlights: Private prescriptions issued on the spot
overview.content: We take a full history, examine you thoroughly, and arrange rapid tests if necessary (strep, flu, COVID, blood work, or imaging). Treatment plans may include private prescriptions, injectable therapies, letters for work or travel, and referrals to trusted consultants.
overview.title: What Happens During Your Visit

cta.subtitle: Call or WhatsApp us to arrange an urgent appointment.
cta.title: Need to See a GP Today?

hero.subheadline: Appointments in clinic, via secure video, or at home.
hero.headline: Feel Heard, Leave with a Plan

faq.answer: Yes, families are welcome. We allocate more time for paediatric appointments.
faq.question: Do you see children?
Can you visit my home or hotel?
faq.answer: Home visits are available within central London for an additional fee.

faq.question: Will you update my NHS GP?
faq.answer: We can share reports with your NHS GP upon request.
